Smart Lightbulb: Develop a smart lightbulb that can be controlled via voice commands or a mobile app. The bulb can be programmed to turn on and off at specific times, change colors, and adjust brightness. This will help users save energy and create a more personalized lighting experience.

Solar-Powered Flashlight: Create a solar-powered flashlight that can be charged using a USB cable or a solar panel. The flashlight can be used during power outages or when you're away from an electrical outlet. This will help users stay safe and prepared during emergencies.

Augmented Reality Flashlight: Develop an augmented reality flashlight that overlays digital information onto the user's view. For example, the flashlight could display a map or directions, or it could provide additional information about a historical site or landmark. This will help users explore new places and gain a deeper understanding of their surroundings.

Smartphone Flashlight: Create a smartphone flashlight app that allows users to control the flashlight on their phone remotely. The app could include features like adjustable brightness, color options, and the ability to turn the flashlight on and off. This will help users keep their hands free while using the flashlight.

Multi-Functional Flashlight: Develop a multi-functional flashlight that includes additional features like a compass, a thermometer, and a whistle. This will help users stay safe and prepared during outdoor activities or emergencies. The flashlight could also be equipped with a rechargeable battery, so users can keep it powered for extended periods of time.
